name: NX Gun-Girl
description:
This was a quick project I wanted to make for 2 reasons, the first was to test out Godot with a more complicated project than what I had used it for previously, the second was to try exporting the game as a playable Switch binary.

I think both the objectives were completed, and I wanted to share the project with the internet for fun.

I will share a web build here just as an easy way to play, but I will also include the files for the Switch version so if you have a modified console you can play it with the Homebrew Menu.

Controls for the web version:

Movement = WASD
Shoot left/right = Mouse left/right button

Controllers for the Switch version:

Movement = d-pad / left stick
Shoot left/right = L / R
